<h1 align="center">
  Facina's Playground個人網站

[觀看連結](https://6433d1cb54084969dc7a7eac--deft-squirrel-12b4d0.netlify.app/)

## 🚀 快速開始：

＊若需要空白 gatsby 專案，請使用 Gatsby CLI ([gatsby 官網教學](https://www.gatsbyjs.com/docs/tutorial/part-0/#gatsby-cli)) 新增一個

1.  **取得專案**

    ```shell
    git clone github.com/Facinalin/probable-enigma.git
    ```

2.  **移動資料夾路徑，安裝套件**

    ```shell
    cd probable-enigma
    npm install
    ```

3.  **運行專案**

    ```shell
    gatsby develop
    ```

4.  **打開專案**

    打開這個連結就可以看到畫面 `http://localhost:8000`!

## 🧐 專案架構：

A quick look at the top-level files and directories you'll see in a typical Gatsby project.

    .
    ├── node_modules
    ├── src
    ├── .gitignore
    ├── gatsby-browser.js
    ├── gatsby-config.js
    ├── gatsby-node.js
    ├── gatsby-ssr.js
    ├── LICENSE
    ├── package.json
    └── README.md
